metadata.title: CVE-2014-8541 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: libavcodec/mjpegdec.c in FFmpeg before 2.4.2 considers only dimensiondifferences, and not bits-per-pixel differences, when determining whetheran image size has changed, which allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (out-of-bounds access) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia crafted MJPEG data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
